title: User manual or instructions needed
selftext:
Hey all,

I recently rented this washing machine but got no user manual with it. It's a Kelvinator 6 kg front load model. The rental company just sent a YouTube video which is pretty useless. I tried doing one load of clothes but the spin only option did not dry the clothes as expected. Does anyone have the user manual or instructions for this machine? Please comment/DM as its usage and functions are very unclear. Specifically, how does one dry clothes in this machine?

Thanks in advance :)
comments: Spin option in such models is supposed to squeeze water from clothes. You then dry it in the sun or shade, resulting in faster drying.
